about_the_game:
Story

.In the year XX39, a giant leek collided with the earth.
The giant leek pierced the miraculous planet, Earth, and tilted the earth's axis 39 degrees.
Hatsune Miku, who came with Negi, plans to turn Earth into Negi's planet.
Humanity creates anti-negi weapons to stop them.
Your objective is only one.
Become Miku Hatsune and turn the earth into a planet of green onions!

Hatsune Miku

.Hatsune Miku has completed her long, long journey in a green onion-shaped spaceship. Let's terrorize the humans in order to rule the earth!

Grow your hair! Destroy buildings!
You can invade as you see fit.
.

Explore

!As you proceed with your invasion, you will discover humans. The humans have their own lives, some join suspicious parties, others indulge in prayer. What you do with them is up to you. You can make them your friends, or you can...
.

Items

.Items may fall when buildings are destroyed. Make use of the characteristics of each item for your invasion!
.

Fighting the Enemy

.As you explore, you may encounter hostile creatures. Use items and other items to kick them to the curb!
.

As you progress further, you may encounter more powerful bosses...
.

name: GOT Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron OR AMD Athlon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU Onboard Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Hatsune Miku invades the earth in this action game. You can grow your hair and destroy the buildings and more...
